comments: Build enough Speed to reach the desired breakpoint (121 or 134 - anything higher may lead to SP consumption issues). After that focus on the trifecta of stats: Crit Rate, Crit DMG, and ATK%.
substats: Speed = Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK%
traces_priority: Jolt Anew (A6) > Star Veil (A2) > Aqua Reign (A4)
name: Cooler Daniel build
